name: Paradox Tower Quest
short_description: Climb the Paradox Tower and defeat the wizard at the top to claim valuable treasures.
reward: Wand of Cosmic Energy, Staff of Cosmic Energy, Spellbook, Life Ring

name: Mintwallin Cyclops Quest
short_description: Navigate through the cyclops fortress to reach the treasure room.
reward: Club Ring, Crown Shield, Warrior Helmet

name: Black Knight Quest
short_description: Defeat the Black Knight and claim his treasures from the ancient temple.
reward: Crown Helmet, Crown Armor, Crown Legs, Crown Shield

name: Vampire Shield Quest
short_description: Enter the vampire lair and retrieve the legendary Vampire Shield.

name: Fire Sword Quest
short_description: Brave the fire devils and dragons to obtain the enchanted Fire Sword.

name: Annihilator Quest
short_description: The ultimate challenge for 4 high level players. Only the bravest dare attempt this quest.
reward: Magic Sword, Stonecutter Axe, Present Box (boots of haste or soft boots), Demon Armor

name: Dwarven Armor Quest
short_description: Help the dwarves and earn the right to wear their special armor.

name: Orc Fortress Quest
short_description: Storm the orc fortress and loot their treasure chamber.

name: Dragon Shield Quest
short_description: Slay dragons to collect their scales and forge the Dragon Shield.

name: Demon Helmet Quest
short_description: Venture into the depths of hell to claim the Demon Helmet.
